title: After spending $955 million, Tech Mahindra to focus on integrating companies - Economic Times
content:
1. After spending $955 million, Tech Mahindra to focus on integrating companies  Economic Times
  2. After committing $955 million on buys, Tech Mahindra to focus on integrating companies  Moneycontrol
  3. Tech Mahindra To Focus On Integrating Companies  NDTV Profit
  4. Tech Mahindra Earned Rs 16 Crore Per Day In Last 90 Days: Profits Increase By 39% Compared To Last Year  Trak.in

description: The company will not be looking to acquire more companies this year, in a bid to merge synergies of past acquisitions.
